title: ABTS-187: Jeff Cannata Interview
description:
In this episode of ABTS, Doug interviews Jeff Cannata from DLC, We Have Concerns, and much more! They discuss Jeff's background in gaming and podcasting, as well as his most recent show Newest Latest Best, plus they play some What's That Sound!

Support Almost Better Than Silence by donating to the tip jar.
